content.detailedDescription: I was looking for coconut on beach when a creature came out of the palms. it appeared before myself with a boxcutter. the alien then said "coconut the is where". he guided me to a large spaceship where we ate space cream potatoes with intergalactic chicken. after devouring the scrumptious meal with all due haste we vacated to ethiopia and watched all the malnutritioned and monetarly defitient individuals ,as one may add. it was an event enjoyed by all even the ethiopians! i best be off, i have places to go and people to see. ta ta and auf wiedersehen.
content.summary: Alien sighting

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving home from a wedding in greer, arizona. at 10:45 p.M., we were approximately 10 miles northeast of greer on highway 260. i saw a very bright light in front of and to the right of our traveling car. since i am unfamiliar with the area, i first assumed it was an oncoming car and readied to turn my hi-beams off. after a moment, i turned off my high beams to reveal that the flashing light was well over the nearest hills and trees. at this point my wife and i noticed that the object would flash as one bright light, then 2 smaller lights, then 4 smaller lights, in no particular order. the light traveled south then west crossing my windshield, then flying nearly parallel to us. i estimate that the object was less than a mile away, and rather low, maybe 2500 feet altitude at most. at its closes point, i relate the flash to the brightness of a nearby streetlight or headlight. it was also moving very fast. my wife estimated that between flashes it had traveled the length of her forearm in relation to our vantage point, which would put it at an incredible speed. the experience was so intense that my wife and i decided to actually accelerate to get away from the object as soon as possible, especially given that we were in the white mountains of arizona (travis walton). while accelerating away, i kept my eye on this object in my rearview mirror. it appeared to be traveling north before disappearing out of sight. the area we sighted the object in is incredibly secluded. no airports are nearby, and the nearest town is pinetop which was another 30 miles away. given how close it came to us, had it been an airplane or helicopter, it would have been easily discernable as such.
content.summary: Very bright flashing light that would flash as either 1, 2, or 4 light. very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out on my back patio last night with the lights out. sitting with the dogs and just looking at the sky wishing that i could see a ufo. i kept telling myself that i could do it, i could actually manifest it.  with all i have heard and read, i figured they were there and just cloaked so nobody could see them. i have to admit i just finished reading whitley's book, the grays.

i was also listening to art bell's show. it was just before the top of the 11:00pm hour here in la, so he was at the end of open lines. 
i was expecting to see a saucer. or should i say "hoping"". but then in the distance in the northeast i saw a faint triangle that i thought was just some light or faint stars in a triangular config like taurus. but it was much much smaller.

but then i realized the whole damn triangle was moving toward me. i got so excited and jumped up to see better or to see if i was hallucinating. i stood in my back yard and watched it whispering "oh my god, oh my god" over and over.
nope it continued on a path out of the north and moving sorth but it was well east of me. i followed it across 2 thirds of the sky until it disappeared over my neighbor's house. 

i ran through the house and out the front door to see if i could see it on the other side, but couldn't because of the street lights.
oh my gosh,  i finally saw a real ufo. it wasn't a saucer, but it was definitely not a plane or helicpoter either.

i know it wasn't an airplane because it was two lines of lights, one on either side of the isosceles triangle. it was one light at the forward-most point with either 3 or 4 lights along either side and the rest of it looked the same color as the sky. like maybe it was meant to camouflage with the sky. so it looked like a flying boomerang but with a narrower angle than a boomerang would have.
i know. hold your fingers up loike a peace sign and that would be the angle of the configuration.
and using the peace sign analogy, everything between my fingers as well as the 3rd imaginary line between my two finger tips looked like the same hazy color as the sky.

i see airplanes all the time, some very high up, but you can still tell when it's  plane because there is a red light on one side, a green one on the other and sometimes white in the middle that goes in a circle.. this was only faint white lights, like the least visible stars in the sky.

i know you want to know how big, but that's hard because i don't know how far away it was. but if i held my arm up and pointed to it, the whole thing would be about the size of a small fingernail. and it moved quickly, much fater than an airplane at high altitude would have taken to travel across that much sky. like i kept saying, "oh my god, oh my god, " over and over, maybe ten  times and then it was over the neighbor's house. they are in a 2 story house and so that would have been about ...Ok i am going to pretend that the bowl of the sky is a half of a clock. the zenith is 12 o'clock.. so when i first saw the triangle it was like 10:00 o'clock and it disappeard above my neighbor's house at 2:00 o'clock. i don't know of a better way to try to describe how far i tracked it. but mind you it was defiitely not directly overhead, but rather far off to the east of me. i live right near the beverly center, and i'd say it was way over past downtown la. but of course if it was really really high, and i'm sure it must have been,it could have been over like big bear or mabe even the dessert or something like that.

it just seemd to track so unexpectedly fast across the sky. oh and it made no noise. but i guess if it was really far away, i wouldn't expect to hear anything. but i think part of my mind was saying, it should make some noise.

when i calmed down i wanted to tell somebody. my son wasn't home yet, so i called my daughter and told her. they both hate that i am into ufos and art bell, etc, so she just placated me with words like "i'm so happy for you", and i know she wasn't. but i just had to tell somebody.

i know, "welcome to the club"
tamar brooks in los angeles

note my new email address tamarbrx@ca.Rr.Com
by the way, everyone on comcast in southern california has been changed over to road runner, so if you get other people's email bouncing back and they are on comcast.Net, then change their domain name to ca.Rr.Com and it should go through. they are giving us a year to change over but i did it right away.
content.summary: Faint lights in triangular formation from the north moving sortheastly direction fast across sky no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking to a friend as i went to go back i the house during storm i saw the craft flew south i ran for my camera but was to late . while talking to my girlfriend i checked outside a few time then boom saw it flying north ran for my cam and taped it
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: It flew over head with no blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: Several photos taken of marly at dusk. other photos show vapor trail only.
content.summary: Photo taken at dusk. didn't see object at time of photo.

content.detailedDescription:
We observed an object last night traveling north over tucson that we judged to be at least a mile in width. we reported this to the ufo reporting centers peter davenport and i include the report below.........We also called a couple of news channels in phoenix and told them that if this object continued its present course it would be over phoenix within perhaps a half hour. we are still looking for additional informations and additional reports. spoke to peter davenport (ufo reporting center) last night by phone and am waiting to hear back from him

witness #1 daniel baker 55 yr old male. retired police officer. 4 years usaf as security police (also fielded calls from civilians who called the base, in regards to ufo sightings). currently run security company

 

witness #2 kathy baker 47 yr old female. currently runs security company

 

witness #3 kim baker 19 year old female. attends u of a

 

at 2230 hrs this date, i (daniel baker) went to the front of my yard to walk towards a neighbor with the intent of checking on their dog since they were away on vacation. our house lies in the foothills (north central) area of tucson adjacent the catalina mountains. i heard one of my dogs bark and i turned to look back at the house. directly above the house i observed the object. the object was flying south to north. i would estimate that it was directly above i-10 (i-10 runs north and south) i-10 is approx. 7 miles due west of my house. it was approx. 25 degrees above the horizon.I would estimate, and its only an estimate that from light to light would make the object at least one mile long. my first thought was that the object(s) were in fact 3 objects strung out together and flying in formation. i assumed they were helicopters flying north. there is a marine aviation base due north of us. holding my hand at arms length in front of me, i would estimate object would have been (from running light to running light) 4-5 fingers in length. the object at its southern point had one non flashing light, in its approx center was another non flashing red light, at its northern point were two lights, one which was white and non blinking and another light very close to the white light and it was red in color and blinking. my wife exited the front door and i yelled at her to grab the binoculars and run out with them. this she complied with, retireved the binoculars and she and kim came out to join me. i brought the binoculars into focus and could see the object, which appeared to be moving fairly slow and continuing north. i could also ascertain that there was a darkened area between the 4 lights and that in fact these were not 3 seperate objects. this horizontal area or structure did not appear to be very high but was flattened and "line" like. i handed off the binoculars to both kathy and kim. we continued to watch the object as it continued north. approx 3 minutes into the observation the object appeared to make a flight adjustment and it began turning into a north-west flight angle. at this point and through the binoculars i could now see the rear end of the object. you could now see that it possessed 2 white lights in the rear of the structure. it looked as though you were watching the rear end of a car that had two white running lights. the distance between the two rear light would be approx 1 finger held up at arms length. the 3 other lights(red in the center, white and blinking red up fron) were also still visible but at more of an angle. the front flashing red light was still visible. at all times the lights remained at a fixed distance from each other, the distance never varied as it would if you were watching a string of conventional aircraft stuggling to maintain position relative to each other. i was able to observe the object from its new flight path for approx another minute to two minutes until it was lost over the horizon. the object appears to have corrected its flight path from when first viewed to the point that it turned northwest as i believe i-10 makes the same course adjustments. i believe the object was certainly following and flying directly above i-10, turning as i-10 turned, but im not completely sure of this. i could not estimate its speed, but it was not flying very quickly, but i would guess that if these were in fact helicopters, it would appear to be about the same speed as a helicopter at that distance. there was no sound. we contacted a nearby neighbor (too late for him to see it), but as we talked in the driveway he related to me that during a ball game this evening, the crowds were witnessing many strange lights in the night skies.......He didnt elaborate. i have made a rough sketch of the object.

 

dan

-- 
daniel baker
general manager
centurion security industries, inc.

visit us on the web at www.Csiarizona.Com

phoenix metro
3370 n. hayden rd., suite 123
scottsdale, az. 85251
1-877-274-3648

tucson area
3361 n. campbell ave. suite 411
tucson, az. 85719
520-940-0433

reply	forward

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:30-8:00 pm i saw a steady bright white light moving over brookings, or going west to east. it was traveling very fast.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
As my most recent post at http://bluestravels.Com states, i was out for the day with the express purpose of taking fall foliage photos with my digital camera.

i live in central va and happened to be in crozet va taking my first photos when i decided to take a few shots from my car seat.

i had pulled off the side of the road, rolled down my window, held the camera out the window at arms lenghth and began to take several shots of a mountain side. i was not looking at the horizon, but rather was looking the "display" on my canon powershot a80 in order to aim it. the first two photos were taken 7 seconds apart.

now, at first i had no idea what i had just taken a photo of. i did not suspect anything unusual had occurred. and in truth, i cannot be certain that anything unusual happened at all. but, the a80 is a digital camera that i use sporadically, the temperature outside was app. 60 degrees and i was aiming away from the sun as it was behind me at this point. the time of day was around 134 pm.

when i got home, i began to transfer all my images from my camera to iphoto. i then created a slide show of the pics and uploaded all of them to my web site. i did not edit any of the images, as that takes me too much time. i just used a program called jalbum to make some thumbnails and uploaded the entire album folder to my directory. it was not until i began to look at my own photos that i noticed something strange in the first few pics.

as you can see, something appears to be afoot with the photo in question. look at the center of the photo. what does that look like to you?

i went back to my original photos and checked them. the originals showed the same thing.

ok reader, what i would like to know is this: is this simply a digital anomaly? do you have any friends who are photographers who could evaluate this?

for the record, i took a total of 29 photos today. you can view them all at http://www.Cfcure.Com/mt/images/album102106/index.Html

is this a photo of a ufo phase shifting?

now, i have no knowledge of any sightings being reported today. however, i have not heard the news or read the papers.

are any of you aware of any sightings being reported in the central virginia area on sat 10 21 06 around 130 pm?

leave a comment, or email me at ayerstcarr @ earthlink dot net
content.summary: Black sphere's

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving east on highway 70 near high hill missouri. the date was october 21, 2006, and the time was approx. 5:30pm. the weather was poor, with light rain and overcast skys. my wife noticed two unusual objects in the air, north of our location. the objects were clearly visible, and appeared to be hovering below the cloud cover. the object on the left was higher than the one on the right.

i was driving, but was able to get a good look at the objects. at first glance, i thought i was seeing two skydivers, because there seemed to be a mass hanging below a larger mass on each object. the objects were not losing altitude, so i wondered if they were ultra light aircraft, but as time went by and we got a clearer look, there were no wings, and no rotors. 

the objects were not rounded like hot air balloons, but instead, had an irregular outline. there were no lights on either object, and no markings of any kind. they seemed to be hovering, or moving very slowly north, away from us. the terrain the appeared over was fairly flat farmland.

both my wife and i had never seen anything like these two objects, but it was not safe to stop on the side of the road, in the rain, so we drove on and finnaly lost site of the objects.

we tried to think of what these to objects could have possibly been, and stll have no idea. they had mass, and reflected light, but appeared to be mostly dark grey.
content.summary: Driving east on highway 70 near high hill, i saw two unusual objects to the north, hovering over farmland.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in dolores park clear day a women asked me if i saw to dots in the sky not moving, i looked up saw to dots stationary shiney with a bright center
content.summary: Metal objects (3) moving in a triangle configuration

content.detailedDescription: On october 15, 2006 at around 8:30 am , with a clear blue morning sky, i was sitting outside in my backyard facing north and looked west and saw an object at about 45 degrees that looked like 5 round white balls in a row, east to west, one on top of the other, with a bright white light below them but not attached to them. the lower ball in line would dart in and out of line, from left to right (south to north), then would get back in line. at first i thought that it must be balloons, skydivers or small aircraft flying in formation but they didn't move in altitude. after about 10 minutes of watching, the bright white light below the balls started moving away from them going to the west and was getting smaller. at this time i went inside to get my camera but i am very slow moving because i am mending a broken left leg. by the time i hobbled back with the camera, the round white objects had moved higher up to about 90 degrees and had moved south and the bright white light below them was gone. the balls moved higher and further south slowly. i tried to take some photos with my kodak easy share c340. the objects stayed in straight east to west line and got higher in the morning sky and moved further south until they looked like a single small bright white dot in the blue sky until i could no longer see them. i hope you can make out the photos but they had gone higher in the sky by the time i took the photos. i have seen many strange lights here in vegas sky's, mostly at night, but nellis afb is only about 5 miles to the north east of here and the nellis test range (where area 51 is) is due north, so you have to think a lot i see in the sky is military in origin.  but this sighting was due west, the opposite side of the valley from nellis and no way near the test range. maybe someone else saw this too and got a better look or better photos and can tell me what it was.
content.summary: White balls and white light in the las vegas morning sky

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend were leaving a fish camp when we noticed the lights across the lake over approx. downtown tallahassee...  there were three lights that came on at different times and stayed on for about 30 seconds each 3 times the object appeared and they all went off at different times...  at the time of the first sighting there was a second object off to and above to the left of the main object...  it only had one light that came on one time at the time of the first sighting of the object with 3 lights.....  the single light object went out slowly and then the object with 3 lights went out slowly each light going out seperately....  the object lights were of golden color more golden than the average car headlight...  we saw airplanes taking off from our right which was the area of tallahassee airport approx. 20 miles  away,  we saw military aircraft come into the area at a high altitude with just their small strobe light and appear to be watching the event or trying to figure out what was going on...  tyndall air force base just west of panama city, fla. is only about 5 minutes flying time to the area in question......  the military aircraft appeared to be approx. 3 in number at first and then they left the area,  another on approached from the area of tyndall and went to approx. the last location of our sighting,  it made a turn and went back toward tyndall...  the object i saw appeared 3 times from 8:30 pm eastern to around 8:55 pm...  each time the object appeared it was stationary but in a different location each time...  the lone light object never appeared more than once and it was stationary also...  the 3 light object probably moved about a few miles from each location...  the object started on my right,  appeared the second time more to my left and the last time it appeared it was back to my right but not as far as the first time..  each time it appeared the lights came on one at a time and stayed on for about 30 seconds and went off one at a time except the last time a glow appeared between the 3 lights and then they went off one at a time and it was not seen again...  at this time is when (what seemed like)a military plane came in to the area checked and left back toward tyndall....  the object was low on the horizon so no one in a neighborhood would be able to see because of our wooded areas around here...  it was approximately at 15 to 20 degrees above the horizon,  no further.....  my guess is that it was bout 10 miles to my south from my location...  there was no movement at all while the lights were on from either object..........?????????  my reaction was that i'll never go to that lake again without my video camera...  i do video and photography for a living and i have never seen an object like this in my 53yrs.....  i wasn't scared because it looked just like the phoenix lights,  maybe more golden.....  my friend who saw the same object said what we saw was really weird and he couldn't describe how he felt except it was really weird,  he was more frieked out because he really hadn't seen the reports of the phoenix lights..... i'm also hold a commercial helicopter pilot's license..
content.summary: Phoenix lights over tallahassee

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on i-70 from wadsworth (wheatridge-suburb west of denver)i saw 3 low flying white light no other colors. the center light dived down like a bird. when i got onto i-25 south from i-70 they turned and were on the east side of downtown denver. 

whe i noticed that they seemed to be going along with me i called the police denver lakewood/denver.
content.summary: 3 white lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was 4:03am and i had just went to bed. about five minutes later the power went off for about 25 seconds. it came back on and stayed on for approximately 20 seconds and then it glitched 3 times and went off for about 35 seconds. after it came back on for the last time a jet flying at low altitude flew over going north. i think i heard another jet off in the distance to the west but i'm not totally sure. the military uses this route quite often but the community has never had power outages at the exact same time that i know of. could they have been chasing something? i don't know. it could be a coincidence but i feel that i need to report it. i have two other sightings that i would like to share with you from 1984. my friend and i had a sighting just a few miles away back in the summer of 1984. we were playing in an open field close to sundown and a triangle flew right over us & went north-east. it was flying just above the tree-tops very slowly. it had what looked like flourecent tube lights going down each side. each one was a different color. one was blue, one green, and the other was red. we couldn't tell what the color of the craft was but the size was about 30 feet across! what really sets in my mind is that it was totally silent. i will never forget it. later that same year in the winter, my mom was coming back from the mall in beckely, w.V. after a day of shopping. as she came across meadow river bridge, at the fayette/nicholas county line into mt. lookout, she noticed a moon-sized bright white light about 800 feet away hovering over the river at around the same height as the bridge.(about 100 feet high) she said that she slowed down and while she was looking she saw a white sphere come out of the bottom of it and go down into the forest below. she said that she could see the sphere flying around the trees at amazing speeds and that she could also see the light from it reflecting off of the trees. according to her the sphere shot back into the bottom of the hovering craft and then the craft flew straight up and disappeared into the night sky at a tremedous speed. she has had a couple of strokes earlier this year but her story has never changed.

larry
mt. nebo, w.V.
content.summary: Power outage with the presence of  approximately 2 low altitude jets

content.detailedDescription: Well i was driving down interstate 10west going to new orleans, when at about 3:50a.M. i seen a light in the sky i watched it for about 15 minutes before i ask my fiancee what it could be, at first we thought it was a star, but it was to big to be a star, so than i was like maybe it's a tower so then i realized that we should have passed the tower up, but we never did. then all of a sudden blue laser light's at the bottom appeared, then from the top red balls were being spit out. i was so scared that i started to pray cause i thought jesus was coming back. then all of a sudden a cloud came in front of the object, and i told my fiancee if that thing popped from out the cloud then i knew something was operating it, and before i could really finish the whole sentence it popped out from behind the clouds. so then now i have realized that i'm about to run out of gas so at this point i'm not looking, but my fiancee is watching at this time so here's her statement. well when i did look up into the sky the red balls were still being spit from the top of this object, and it started to make different forms of highways, and it even a form of the earth and it was spinning around just like the earth spins around. i was so shock that i couldn't even get my camara and snap pictures of this. so by this time i'm getting very sleepy, and i couldn't stay awake, when we arrive at our desination it was daylight outside and this object was still up there my fiancee took his eyes off it for about a second and we looked up there again it just disappeared.
content.summary: All lit up spitting out red balls that made different shapes and forms of different things.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of full moon 2nd shot!  light was present after downloading film! it seems there is always something to see up there at night good visability!
content.summary: Strange light on film after downloading

content.detailedDescription: Wile coming home from a family reunion in roscommon mi.Going south on i 75 we were approcing the zilwaukee bridge my wife seen something in the sky. she asked me if i could see what she was seeing and yes i could, when we crested the top of the bridge it looked like a circle craft with windows. my best guess would be 1,000 feet in the air just hovering. after about 15 sec. it went straght up and disapered in a sec. not wanting too scare the kids that were 6 and 7 at the time we asked each other did that thing do what i thought it did. and  we still talk about to this day. i know that a lot of people seen it that were on the bridge at that time but nothing was written in the papers or on the news..
content.summary: Wile coming home from a family reunion some years ago my wife and i seen what we we believe was a ufo hovering over zilwaukee bridge

content.detailedDescription:
It was about midnight on 17th oct 2006 when i walked out to my verandah which looks directly at mt cootha, brisbane, that i noticed an object moving rapidly from the east of mt coother at about 300 feet above grd level.  the only reason i assumed cigar was that there were two white lights at either end and in between was dark.  it seemed a lot larger than the craft i have seen previously.  it moved at a rapid speed and was by pure luck that i happened to be watching at the right moment.  i have noticed more recently that i am present when strange phenomenon are present in the sky. this particular incident made me feel exhilirated and quietly excited.  i have seen quite a few strange and unexplained things which i have not reported before as i already believe though thought it was selfish not to share my experiences
when i first saw the object i knew immediately it was a ufo as the absence of sound from an object so big and so close, as we live in a valley and the sounds echo from everything!!

the object simply moved very fast from over mt cootha towards the city and was gone in five seconds after passing past a palm tree.
content.summary: Object was moving rapidly at about 300 feet above grd level.  was cigar shaped and had white lights at either end.

content.detailedDescription: I have indeed seen a ufo, but no one believes me. it was a very hazy night and i could see no stars. the all of a sudden, a bright blinking way up in the sky began. after a second of blinking, it took off in a weird way. it went from little, to bigger, to bigger to bigger until it dissapeared. it did this very fast, each time moving a tiny bit. i want to be a ufoligist or someone who studies all the supernatural. if there is anyone out there who has seen one or knows what i saw.
content.summary: It was a very hazy night and i could see no stars

content.detailedDescription: I sighted two separate and different objects about 10 minutes apart from each other over tempe, arizona / sky harbor intl airport about 2:45 airport today thursday, october 18th 2006. i was sitting in my car on my lunch break at my office parking lot slightly north and east of the airport. the first object i noticed was a tumbling black and white object moving fairly swiftly from east to west. i only saw this object for a few seconds before it disappeared in the haze. i have seen other ufo's in this area before and they usually come with company so i waited for something else. about 5 minutes later a larger white/red " orb " appeared straight overhead and was stationary for about 5 minutes. i had seen this same object in the exact same spot two times a couple weeks prior. the sky was clear with a very light haze, but it was impossible to judge the size or altitude of the object. it finally started to drift south. the object was very bright white and would occasionally flash or strobe red. eventually after about 15 minutes it drifted out of sight. i imagine to the naked eye this object could pass for a balloon, but the color strobe change and for this to appear in the exact spot on three separate days for me has ruled that out. being right over the airport i am amazed you do not hear more about these orbs, globes, balloons , or whatever they are. i will keep my eyes out for more..Eventually hope to photograph or videotape some in the future..As they seem to be fairly regular ..Almost predictable occurances.
content.summary: Two different objects seen over sky harbor intl airport / tempe arizona

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting at my sofa that faces a southern big window.It was dark outside.
i noticed this ball moving rather quick in a downward arc. there was no
glow outside of it,just lit inside with a white light. there is no way i can tell how big
it was or how far away it was. the hole view lasted less than a second.Then it was out side of view because of window .
i heard nothing.
 i live on the northern side of tower creek canyon facing south.
 the object moved from east to west as far as i can tell.
 i had reported it to the ufo reporting site on the internet and they insisted it was a comet or meteorite.I felt as if they were giving me
a load of crap!
content.summary: Like an internally lit pingpong ball. no glow,no trail or tail behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling west on fl state road 50 at about 60mph through lake county florida on sunday, october 15th 2006. we had just passed through groveland fl. this was a very dark portion of the road with no buildings and no artificial light (except for our headlights)  at approximately 9:05pm my wife while looking out of the passenger window of our vehicle observed four glowing  green lights, (orbs)  in the ne sky.I estimate that the lights were at appoximately 65 degrees above horizion in the ne sky.  the shape of the lights, orbs, was oval. they were moving very rapidly in a synchronized almost choreographed pattern in the shape of a figure eight that was turned on its side. the lights never appeared to touch or converge into one in the center of the  pattern. when it looked like they would collide they would suddenly veer away from each other and continue the pattern.    i pulled over and exited the vehicle to get a better look. there was absolutely no sound. my wife , daughter and myself watched these lights from the side of the road until 9:15pm, (10 minutes).  we then got back into our car and continued on west on fl sr 50 into hernando county fl.My wife and daughter continued to observe these lights almost continually until 9:36 pm (trees would intermittently block their view as i drove) at approximately 9:25 pm as we drove, we   observed two bright white lights that we attributed to helicopters heading toward the  above mentioned green ovals. one was coming from the north and the other from the south.  the weather conditions were partly cloudy and according to weather.Com visibility was 10 miles.  we were returning from a three day stay at walt disney world in lake buena vista, fl

 i first thought these might be advertising lights or something along that vein but there were no beams trailing behind the glowing ovals. i am a retired police officer. i try to look at things objectively without preconcieved notions; that said, this was a weird experience. my wife said that it had a "calming" effect on her. my daughter however was anxious and somewhat scared. that is why we did not stay parked longer at the road side observing the lights. i thank you for listening to my report and if you determine that any followup is needed do not hesitate to contact me. 
 please note that my wife suddenly became very tired and actually fell asleep right after we could no longer see the glowing objects. i was still driving and it was 9:41 pm when i noticed my wife was asleep. she was still awake at 9:36 pm because she commented that she could no longer see the objects.
content.summary: 4 green ovals

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was outside at about 10:00am throwing a ball for the two dogs. this is in the front yard area. 

2.I saw a shadow on the ground from the sky, sometimes aircraft will pass through the sun at just the right angle and you can see the shadow real quick on the ground, this was the same case except i couldnt hear anything. its been very overcast over here the last couple days, the clouds have been moving in and out of the suns way all day today. 

3.I was able to see a blimp or cigar like shape, it was more shaped like a cigar, or a submarine. it wasnt moving very fast, maybe....150mph. thats just a guess, its hard to tell when its so high. im going to also guess that it was three quarters of a mile high, it moved in and out of the clouds, no unusual movments. no visual markings, possibly round windows or portholes on the side. maybe 10-15. 

6.It finally vanished when it hovered and went straight up into the air, not like a fighter jet with the nose pointed up, this was like a helecopter taking off from the ground. it just kept going up and up and then once it went through the clouds, i couldnt see it anymore. im not going to suggest that it was extraterrestrial, but i will say that it wasnt normal at all. to low to be a test aircraft, i could see it, and it didnt move fast at all like modern technology. it acted just like a blimp, but im 100% sure it wasnt.
content.summary: Cigar shape ufo in orange county, ca for 7 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were driving along the beach on east cliff drive in santa cruz (pleasure point) southbound. very clear sunny day; the same day that flights were grounded because of the terrorist interception at heathrow airport. i saw the object and stared at it hovering in the sky. it was so strange because it was a very peculiar shape; not at all the type of thing that you would expect to fly, let alone hover in place. also the craft/object had a white ball-shaped object that was suspended about 20 yards directly in front of the rectangle. it appeared as if it were part of the object (due to the way it stayed exactly the same distance in front of the rectangle, no matter how fast it moved or changed direction, yet there was no visible physical connection between the 2 objects).

i asked my fiancee to look at the ufo with me while we drove. i opened my passenger side window and got my torso out of the car and pointed, trying to get others to look at it as well. we neglected to pull over so we could get closer to it and figure out what the hell it was. it was so out of the ordinary. it moved similar to the way a helicopter would move, yet there were no blades or vaportrails, or visible propulsion on the ufo. in terms of distance it was approximately 1/2 mile away from us, up in the air (hard to tell how high, but definitely low, the way a recreational single engine plane would cruise the coast). it hovered for a minute or two, then took off towards san jose (east). it was traveling at a deceptively high speed, to the point where we could not keep it in sight as we attempted to follow it from the ground. the object looked like the same size as a b-52 bomber-type, but again had no wings of any type, and really just looked like a huge flying cardboard box, with shelves all over it and the strange white ball in front of it. 

i have never seen anything like that in my life. both my fiancee and i have near-perfect vision, and were of perfect state of mind before seeing the object. what makes this whole event so strange was that as we were speeding through capitola trying to keep the object in sight (we lost it very quick after it took off), i looked up to my right and saw the weirdest thing: a low-flying pitch black helicopter that neither of us could even hear, flying fast towards where the ufo was hovering above the coast. the helicopter was close enough to see that it had absolutely no markings or lights, or anything identifiable. it was definitely military looking, almost like an attack helicopter, but it hardly made any noise. 

this event made me very upset, because it was almost as if everybody were oblivious to what was going on in the sky. if i hadn't have looked where i looked when i did, i wouldn't even have seen the helicopter, but i caught it perfectly. it was clearly moving very fast towards where the ufo had been, but almost as if it didn't know that the ufo had taken off less than a minute before. i got pretty worked up, and again upset, because clearly nobody around us, pedestrian or otherwise, even looked up or noticed what was going on. i honestly don't know why anyone who had seen it didn't drop everything and stare at the sky.

when we arrived at our office, which was in the same direction as the object, i ran in and called the watsonville airport. i talked to somebody at the airport who told me they had seen nothing strange and knew nothing of what i was speaking about. i called the newspaper, i called the news, and they all said i was the only person to call it in!

i have always believed that there is intelligent life in the universe, but this is the only time i have ever seen anything. i even tried to call moffet field, the faa, etc., but i had no luck getting any answers.
content.summary: Brown rectangular large object hovering and flying with a white ball-shaped object suspended in front of the rectangle. un-aerodynamic object, tried to follow but it flew off too fast.

content.detailedDescription:
there was at least 5 sightings of this triangular craft.  the first sighting was on the morning of 8/9/06.  the time was 5:40 a.M. i looked out my bedroom window, and saw what appeared to be a very large, bright yellow light, hanging in the eastern sky.  as i watched it for a few seconds, i noticed it didn't appear to be moving.  i grabbed my camera which is a kodak easyshare c643 c603 digital camera, and took acouple of pictures.  as the light started to move, it turned into a bright white light.  i then started to video it, as it seemed to move south.  i said to myself, please come this way, and to my amazement it did.  at the time, the distance was quit a few miles away, and was very hard to determine just how far away it was.  as i continued to video, i was curious to see just how far away this object was from me,as it was hard to tell, by looking into the view finder. as i took my eye away from the view finder, i was shocked to see, it was almost to my house, but in the viewfinder it didn't look at all that close. nor could i make out it's shape at that time.  when i saw the shape, and size of it, i was just in awe, i ran to my bathroom, that is just next to my bedroom, and waited for it to fly over the large trees, that's behind by house.  i put my face up against the screen, and looked to the east waiting for it to pass over.  all of a sudden there it was, huge! i could see the shape , colour, and the large circular lights in four rows, that ran across the bottom  horizontally.  this fantastic craft, was at least 100 feet in lenght, by 150 feet wide across  the back.   it could have been even larger, but that is my estimate, because of the lights on it. there also appeared, a small green light, which was off to it's right side, that blinked, but for some reason, i thought it was seprate from the craft, because it appeared there was a black void between them. as it flew over my head i tried to take pictures, but my camera flashed, and all i got was the bright flash, and the screen. the altitude was no more then 150 feet, the speed was approximatly 25 to 30 miles per hour, and the only sound it made, was a very low rumbling, or roaring sound.  as it continued over me to the west, it banked without speeding up, or slowing down.  this was an amazing sight  because, it seemed to pivot on it's left tip, while it brought it's nose around to face south. it then followed the top of the hill, and proceeded to travel south until it was out of my sight.

  the second sighting of this same craft came 2 weeks to the day from the first sighting, and at the same time.  this time i caught a great picture, with what appears to be bright white objects attached on it's tips.  there is also some structure on the bottom.   the third sighting came on 8/28/06, i also took pictures of this craft on that day.  i will send you the pictures and the videos that go with them.  i have to send them seperate, to keep them in order by date for you to view.


   sincerely,

   francine


   sincerely,

   francine
content.summary: I have seen, and taken pictures and videos of this triangular shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i decided to camp at war hill lake in dawsonville, georgia this past friday 13th october through sunday.
at approximately 10:30p as we were falling asleep in our tent, i heard a thunderous noise coming towards us from the south side of the lake. the noise was definetly a helicopter and almost certainly a hewey, its roaring engines sounded like it was going at full throttle, it was deafening. i stuck my head out of the tent in time to see the chopper approaching, fast and barely 70ft above the lake. it was as i stared at the helicopter that i saw it. ahead of the chopper (perhaps 50 yards ahead of it and 100 yards to the chopper's left) was a boomerang-shaped object flying silently over the tree tops. what stunned me was that the object was not only a ghostlike pale white/blue glow but the craft was so incredibly thin, that i couldn't even see any bulge or area in the fusalage that would be capable of fitting one or more pilots. the object looked like 2 giant, glowing toothpicks, joined in a v with basketball-like glowing orbs at the wing-tips and one in the center joint. it then came clear to me that the chopper was tracking the object in some way, either racing it, chasing it or observing it. the sighting lasted 10 seconds, however given the halfmoon starlit night, visibility was amazing.
     just for the record, i'm a 31 year old journalist, spent the past 6 years working for cnn, i've also spent 10 years studying our night skies with a number of high-powered telescopes and this sighting, frankly, is the least of it. 
     keep looking up.
content.summary: Ultra thin glider-like boomerang, pale white/blue color with orbs at tips

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i was reading just outside my house and i happened to look up and a small flash of light(like you get when sunlight reflects of metal) caught my eye. just slightly above the treetops (at a distance) was a silvery shape.  at first i thought this was just an airplane, but it couldn't be, since it was motionless(and silent). i squinted to get a better look, since the object was reflecting the late-afternoon sun, and i saw that it was a disc, no wings, no tail. at that moment, a chill ran through me and i suddenly became very afraid, and that someone or something was watching me, but i held my ground. such thoughts as, "oh my god!" and "oh crap!" ran through my head as i observed this object. the thing made a few slow manuevers and stopped again, just hanging in the sky. then, seemingly out of nowhere, another object showed up. this one was a black triangle with an outline similar to the stealth fighter. at first i thought it was just that, a stealth fighter, but it made no noise. the triangle headed quickly towards the disc and it looked like it was going to crash into it, but the disc took evasive action. the triangle proceeded to chase the disc about the sky, as if it was trying to chase the disc off and then the two objects shot across quickly to the west and vanished from view.
i stood there for a few moments, dumbfounded, before shakily picking up my book, and heading inside. i felt like a great weight had been put upon my shoulders and i was scared, really scared (i didn't get a wink of sleep that night either). i had two more sightings apiece of the two objects over a period of four months, each showing up at an interval of two months.
content.summary: Disc and triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out my window checking on back yd. the object was moving toward my
house. it moved to the left then to the right. its light were bright white and glowed. the bottom were red. it was moving fast. i watched it in the trees. my son also saw it. he had seen it before also.After it was over it took me a long time to go to sleep. it kind of jumped accross and lights went on and off.It was moving.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved toward me left to right.Blinked and rotated moving east

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this object at 9am in englewood, co. the object was stationary for about 1 hour. i took photos of this object and they are very strange. it looks like a fireball and part of a saucer. it then started to move at super sonic speed when a jet was flying towards it. it then disapeared into the sky. i was on my way to work when i got out of my truck and saw the object.

the photos attached would need to be zoomed in to see the definition of the object.
content.summary: I saw this object for about 1 hour in the same spot. it was spinning in circles.

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in my recliner watching tv and out of the corner of my eye i saw a glint of light.I turned my head and saw a semi-bright ball of light shoot under the power lines on the back edge of my property then across the farm field there and disappeard. it happened so fast it scared me to death. im still shaky two days later.
content.summary: White ball of light shot across my property
